manifest.author: Michael Schrauzer
manifest.name: Continuous Mode
manifest.description: Displays all open notes in a tab group as if they were a continuous scrollable document (sometimes called "Scrivenings mode"). Open all notes in Continuous Mode from a folder, search results, or links in a file or Dataview/query block; use arrow keys to navigate between notes; display notes in “Compact Mode” similar to Evernote or Bear; reorder notes via tab header drag-and-drop, sorting, more.

manifest.author: jvsteiner
manifest.name: Mermaid Themes
manifest.description: Makes it easy to apply custom mermaid.js themes and apply other tweaks. This plugin is supported by advertisements.

manifest.author: Wang Guoshi
manifest.name: Peekaboo
manifest.description: Protect your privacy by setting a password to hide files.

manifest.author: LincZero
manifest.name: NodeFlow
manifest.description: Render node streams like `ComfyUi`, `UE`, `Houdini`, `Blender`, etc., to make it easy to write relevant notes. json describes the chart, compared to screenshots, making it easier to modify later. The plugin is also compatible with blogs.

manifest.author: l1xnan
manifest.name: Better Export PDF
manifest.description: Export your notes to PDF, support export preview, add bookmarks outline and header/footer.

manifest.author: aoout
manifest.name: Epub Importer
manifest.description: Import EPUB files as Markdown.

manifest.author: Matter
manifest.name: Matter
manifest.description: The official Matter <> Obsidian plugin

manifest.author: windingblack
manifest.name: Global Proxy
manifest.description: Use network proxy throughout Obsidian according to the rules configured in this plugin.

manifest.author: Poe Zoel
manifest.name: Ear Training
manifest.description: Get ear training exercises inside your vault.

manifest.author: Alex Kurowski
manifest.name: Solo RPG Toolkit
manifest.description: Random generator tools geared towards solo TTRPG gameplay

manifest.author: Korbin Zhao
manifest.name: Excalidraw CN

manifest.author: Kageetai
manifest.name: Journal Review
manifest.description: Review your daily notes on their anniversaries, like "what happened today last year".

manifest.author: T. L. Ford
manifest.name: File Info Panel
manifest.description: Plugin for Obsidian that creates a File Information view that displays the active file's date created, date modified, file size, and links to open the file in its native application and to open the file's folder.  It also has writing statistics (character, word, sentence, and paragraph counts) and a word frequency analysis.

manifest.author: LarrySAL
manifest.name: Pinyin Replacer
manifest.description: Simple plugin to use the pinyin tones in obsidian without having to install extra keyboard layouts.

manifest.author: Chasebank87
manifest.name: Import GitHub Readme
manifest.description: Fetches and integrates GitHub README files into personal notesmai

manifest.author: mwoz123
manifest.name: Swiss army knife
manifest.description: Collection of various utilities e.g. duplicate empty line remove, create expandable/colapsable sections, Obsidian plugin release/tag version download (eg. for mobile tests)

manifest.author: sundevista
manifest.name: YouTube Template
manifest.description: A plugin that would help you to fetch YouTube videos data into your vault.

manifest.author: Cooksync
manifest.name: Cooksync
manifest.description: Automatically imports recipes collected using Cooksync

manifest.name: BlindFold
manifest.description: Fold text by making it completely hidden.

manifest.name: Unit Converter

manifest.author: datawitch
manifest.name: Recursive Copy
manifest.description: Recursively copies all markdown files in a folder, concatenates them, and copies them into the clipboard. Useful for quickly loading context into AI. Can be triggered by right clicking a folder and selecting the context menu item, or by binding a key (will copy everything in the active file's folder).
